item.description:
Four pairs of tiles, themed for Centurion, for play with any Profile System game.

Cataphract
Chariots
Hoplites
War Elephants

After players select their bags of Soldier Tiles and the gameboard is set up, they take their appropriate-colored tiles from Roman Auxiliaries and add them to their bags.

Move descriptions:
Cataphract - Starting Side: slide straight ahead/behind one space straight ahead/behind, defense one space away left and right, move two spaces away left and right; Flip Side: slide straight left/right one space straight left/right, defense one space away straight ahead and behind, move two spaces away straight ahead and behind;
Chariots - Starting Side: slide straight ahead one space away straight ahead, strike one space away left and right, move one space away diagonally right and left (forwards), jump two spaces away diagonally right and left (forwards); Flip Side: non-capturing move one space left and right, move one and two spaces straight behind, slide straight ahead one space away straight ahead, jump two spaces away straight ahead;
Hoplites - Starting Side: move one space away straight ahead, right, left, diagonally right and left (backwards), defense two spaces away straight ahead, right, left, diagonally right and left (forwards); Flip Side: defense all spaces 2 away diagonally forward and straight, move one space straight ahead, two spaces left and right, strike one space away left and right, non-capturing move one space away diagonally left and right (backwards);
War Elephants - Starting Side: smash straight ahead and diagonally right and left (forwards) one and two spaces; Flip Side: move one space diagonally, dread one space away orthogonally

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
